title: [Chinese Language][learning] dong wu
description:
[Chinese Language][learning] dong wu
----------------------------------------------------------------------

  brought to you by DaoBan

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Content:

Designed for young chinese children.

Each "chapter" has
-the pinyin pronunciation (written and spoken) of the word for the animal (initial, final, then combined)
-the english pronunciation 9written and spoken) of the word for the animal (not native English speaker)
-a description, in chinese, of the animal
-"neato" graphics (if you&#039;re a child)

Frankly, I&#039;m split on my opinion of this.

Con:
-Half of each .mpg is simply graphics designed to engage a child&#039;s attention.
-English pronunciation is often quite bad
-the pinyin does not include the tone marks

Pro:
-The initial, final, then combined pronunciation is actually quite useful.
-It has the basic animals...  dog, cat, elephant, etc.
-It does include some animals not often seen in things like this, such as:
--snow owl
--dolphin
--sea lion
--squirrel


----------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes on the files:

-Nothing fancy:  VCD -> ISObuster -> .mpg

----------------------------------------------------------------------
